item.title: KI-Tage Halle 2025
item.description: KI-Tage Halle 2025 KI-Tage Halle is a two-day event with a broad program around AI in Halle (Saale). We wrote a small radio stream capturing script in Go that recorded about 2000 hours of radio in 11/2025 from four different broadcasting stations: MDR Aktuell, DLF, DLF Kultur, DLF Nova. We then used canary-v2-1b to transcribe the mostly german audio, grepped the term “KI” in the sentences and stichted together a mostly static website, where you can glance into radio voices talking about AI:
